title.narrative: 2020 Project - National TVET Blueprint/National TVET Workforce Blueprint

description.narrative: The National TVET blueprint will define a strategic road map to guide the development of TVET in Kenya by a comprehensive and coherent framework with the primary goal of maximizing the impact on skilling young Kenyans towards the attainment of dignified and fulfilling work. The National TVET Workforce blue print aims at developing workforce development strategy to foster youth employment in the county, at the same time address how Kenya can overcome the persistent challenges and obstacle for women that ultimately will reduce the possibility for societies to develop pathways for economic growth with social development
